instruction: Create a Blueprint with a string variable PlayerName set to Hero. On BeginPlay print Welcome followed by the player name.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_WelcomeName
PARENT: Actor
VAR PlayerName: String = "Hero"
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: VariableGet [VarName=PlayerName]
NODE n3: Concatenate [A="Welcome "]
NODE n4: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute
DATA n2.Value -> n3.B [String]
DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.InString [String]

NODE n3: Concatenate [A="Welcome "]
NODE n4: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n4.Execute

DATA n3.ReturnValue -> n4.InString [String] {

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n2: GetActorLocation
NODE n3: PrintString

DATA n3.Z -> n4.C [String]

EXEC

instruction: Create a Blueprint that starts a 3-second timer on BeginPlay. Print Timer Started. When it fires print Timer Fired at: followed by game time.
expected_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TimerLog
PARENT: Actor
GRAPH: EventGraph
NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="OnTimer", Time=3.0, Looping=false]
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Timer Started"]
NODE n4: Event_Custom [EventName=OnTimer]
NODE n5: GetGameTimeInSeconds
NODE n6: Concatenate [A="Timer Fired at: "]
NODE n7: PrintString
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Then -> n3.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n7.Execute
DATA n5.ReturnValue -> n6.B [String]
DATA n6.ReturnValue -> n7.InString [String]
actual_dsl:
BLUEPRINT: BP_TimerExample
PARENT: Actor

GRAPH: EventGraph

NODE n1: Event_BeginPlay
NODE n2: SetTimerByFunctionName [FunctionName="OnTimer", Time=3.0, Looping=false]
NODE n3: PrintString [InString="Timer Started"]
NODE n4: Event_CustomEvent [EventName=OnTimer]
NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Timer Fired at: "]
NODE n6: GetGameTimeSeconds

EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute
EXEC n2.Completed -> n3.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n5.Execute
EXEC n4.Then -> n6.Execute

DATA

NODE n5: PrintString
NODE n6: PrintString [InString="Not a player"]
EXEC n1.Then -> n2.Execute

EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n5.Execute
DATA n2.AsCharacter -> n3.Target [Actor]

EXEC n2.CastFailed -> n6.Execute

DATA n1.OtherActor -> n2.Object [Actor]
EXEC n2.CastSucceeded -> n3.Execute

DATA n2.AsCharacter -> n4.Target [Actor]

NODE n5: PrintString [InString="Path: Not Ready"]

EXEC n3.False -> n5.Execute

EXEC n3.False -> n5.Execute }
